name: Warp (itch) (Jabawaka)
description:
Good old arcade fun is back! Choose your ship and race through the Warp tunnel, which could use some maintenance because it is filled with holes. Frantic dashing, impossible jumps and crazy powers will delight you in this action-packed arcade game.

Either try to beat your own best personal time in Solo mode, or go head to head against your friends in the local co-op Vs Player mode. Featuring four different ships, each with different powers to screw over the head of your opponents:

  • Ghost: can turn invisible, avoiding all collisions (but not the powers!!)
  • Bulk: can dash sideways faster, pushing other ships aside
  • Shocker: stuns other ships in the viccinity, rendering them unable to move
  • Trickster: swaps its place with the other shi

Programming and assets by Jabawaka

Music by SSM, testing by SSM, MTBT and JRRG
